means: 绒毛，长茸毛( villus的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: The lacteals of villi are part of the lymphatic system.
sentence.Network_cn: 绒毛的乳糜管是淋巴系统的一部分.

sentence.Network_en: The wall is thin and almost transparent probably due to atrophy of the villi.
sentence.Network_cn: 肠壁薄,几乎是透明的,这可能是因绒毛萎缩.

sentence.Network_en: The villi provide a large area for digestion and absorption.
sentence.Network_cn: 绒毛为消化和吸收提供了很大的面积.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 绒毛膜包在胚胎及其它附属结构的最外面，直接与子宫培膜接触，膜的外表有大量绒毛（villi）。绒毛的发育使绒毛膜与子宫蜕膜接触 …
小肠绒毛（villi）　　小肠绒毛是长在小肠上的，小肠绒毛的作用是可增大小肠吸收的面积 　　小肠绒毛：为固有层和上皮共同凸向肠腔形成 …
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译 _ 上海疯狂英语... ... villein 农奴 villi 长茸毛 villiform 绒毛状的.
肠绒毛(Villi)：由上皮和固有层向肠腔突出而成。于十二指肠和空肠头段发达。

auth_sentence.content: When damaged and inflamed, the villi are unable to absorb food properly, which often causes diarrhoea and malnutrition.

auth_sentence.content: This allows the damaged villi to recover and nutrients can then be absorbed normally again and symptoms disappear.
